file.title: Find file

p.text: This property is looking for files and folders in this directory it. When searching, you can use the search pattern - "*","?","+". For example, "a *. jpg" - find all files with extension jpg, starting with "A" (for example, "abcdef.jpg", "a2.jpg", "a.jpg"). "a? c.exe" - will find all the applications, consisting of three letters beginning with "a" and ending in "s" (for example, "abc.exe", "a2c.exe")
